Name: GpsVer
Desc: Version of the Global Positioning Systems (GPS) IFD, given as 2.0.0.0. This tag is mandatory when the GpsIFD tag is present. When the version is 2.0.0.0, the tag value is 0x02000000.

Name: GpsLatitudeRef
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies whether the latitude is north or south. N specifies north latitude, and S specifies south latitude.

Name: GpsLatitude
Desc: Latitude. Latitude is expressed as three rational values giving the degrees, minutes, and seconds respectively. When degrees, minutes, and seconds are expressed, the format is dd/1, mm/1, ss/1. When degrees and minutes are used and, for example, fractions of minutes are given up to two decimal places, the format is dd/1, mmmm/100, 0/1.

Name: GpsLongitudeRef
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies whether the longitude is east or west longitude. E specifies east longitude, and W specifies west longitude.

Name: GpsLongitude
Desc: Longitude. Longitude is expressed as three rational values giving the degrees, minutes, and seconds respectively. When degrees, minutes and seconds are expressed, the format is ddd/1, mm/1, ss/1. When degrees and minutes are used and, for example, fractions of minutes are given up to two decimal places, the format is ddd/1, mmmm/100, 0/1.

Name: GpsAltitudeRef
Desc: Reference altitude, in meters.

Name: GpsAltitude
Desc: Altitude, in meters, based on the reference altitude specified by GpsAltitudeRef.

Name: GpsGpsTime
Desc: Time as Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value is expressed as three rational numbers that give the hour, minute, and second.

Name: GpsGpsSatellites
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the GPS satellites used for measurements. This tag can be used to specify the ID number, angle of elevation, azimuth, SNR, and other information about each satellite. The format is not specified. If the GPS receiver is incapable of taking measurements, the value of the tag must be set to NULL.

Name: GpsGpsStatus
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the status of the GPS receiver when the image is recorded. A means measurement is in progress, and V means the measurement is Interoperability.

Name: GpsGpsMeasureMode
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the GPS measurement mode. 2 specifies 2-D measurement, and 3 specifies 3-D measurement.

Name: GpsGpsDop
Desc: GPS DOP (data degree of precision). An HDOP value is written during 2-D measurement, and a PDOP value is written during 3-D measurement.

Name: GpsSpeedRef
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the unit used to express the GPS receiver speed of movement. K, M, and N represent kilometers per hour, miles per hour, and knots respectively.

Name: GpsSpeed
Desc: Speed of the GPS receiver movement.

Name: GpsTrackRef
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the reference for giving the direction of GPS receiver movement. T specifies true direction, and M specifies magnetic direction.

Name: GpsTrack
Desc: Direction of GPS receiver movement. The range of values is from 0.00 to 359.99.

Name: GpsImgDirRef
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the reference for the direction of the image when it is captured. T specifies true direction, and M specifies magnetic direction.

Name: GpsImgDir
Desc: Direction of the image when it was captured. The range of values is from 0.00 to 359.99.

Name: GpsMapDatum
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies geodetic survey data used by the GPS receiver. If the survey data is restricted to Japan, the value of this tag is TOKYO or WGS-84.

Name: GpsDestLatRef
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies whether the latitude of the destination point is north or south latitude. N specifies north latitude, and S specifies south latitude.

Name: GpsDestLat
Desc: Latitude of the destination point. The latitude is expressed as three rational values giving the degrees, minutes, and seconds respectively. When degrees, minutes, and seconds are expressed, the format is dd/1, mm/1, ss/1. When degrees and minutes are used and, for example, fractions of minutes are given up to two decimal places, the format is dd/1, mmmm/100, 0/1.

Name: GpsDestLongRef
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies whether the longitude of the destination point is east or west longitude. E specifies east longitude, and W specifies west longitude.

Name: GpsDestLong
Desc: Longitude of the destination point. The longitude is expressed as three rational values giving the degrees, minutes, and seconds respectively. When degrees, minutes, and seconds are expressed, the format is ddd/1, mm/1, ss/1. When degrees and minutes are used and, for example, fractions of minutes are given up to two decimal places, the format is ddd/1, mmmm/100, 0/1.

Name: GpsDestBearRef
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the reference used for giving the bearing to the destination point. T specifies true direction, and M specifies magnetic direction.

Name: GpsDestBear
Desc: Bearing to the destination point. The range of values is from 0.00 to 359.99.

Name: GpsDestDistRef
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the unit used to express the distance to the destination point. K, M, and N represent kilometers, miles, and knots respectively.

Name: GpsDestDist
Desc: Distance to the destination point.

Name: NewSubfileType
Desc: Type of data in a subfile.

Name: SubfileType
Desc: Type of data in a subfile.

Name: ImageWidth
Desc: Number of pixels per row.

Name: ImageHeight
Desc: Number of pixel rows.

Name: BitsPerSample
Desc: Number of bits per color component. See also SamplesPerPixel.

Name: Compression
Desc: Compression scheme used for the image data.

Name: PhotometricInterp
Desc: How pixel data will be interpreted.

Name: ThreshHolding
Desc: Technique used to convert from gray pixels to black and white pixels.

Name: CellWidth
Desc: Width of the dithering or halftoning matrix.

Name: CellHeight
Desc: Height of the dithering or halftoning matrix.

Name: FillOrder
Desc: Logical order of bits in a byte.

Name: DocumentName
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the name of the document from which the image was scanned.

Name: ImageDescription
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the title of the image.

Name: EquipMake
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the manufacturer of the equipment used to record the image.

Name: EquipModel
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the model name or model number of the equipment used to record the image.

Name: StripOffsets
Desc: For each strip, the byte offset of that strip. See also RowsPerStrip and StripBytesCount.

Name: Orientation
Desc: Image orientation viewed in terms of rows and columns.

Name: SamplesPerPixel
Desc: Number of color components per pixel.

Name: RowsPerStrip
Desc: Number of rows per strip. See also StripBytesCount and StripOffsets.

Name: StripBytesCount
Desc: For each strip, the total number of bytes in that strip.

Name: MinSampleValue
Desc: For each color component, the minimum value assigned to that component. See also SamplesPerPixel.

Name: MaxSampleValue
Desc: For each color component, the maximum value assigned to that component. See also SamplesPerPixel.

Name: XResolution
Desc: Number of pixels per unit in the image width (x) direction. The unit is specified by ResolutionUnit.

Name: YResolution
Desc: Number of pixels per unit in the image height (y) direction. The unit is specified by ResolutionUnit.

Name: PlanarConfig
Desc: Whether pixel components are recorded in chunky or planar format.

Name: PageName
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the name of the page from which the image was scanned.

Name: XPosition
Desc: Offset from the left side of the page to the left side of the image. The unit of measure is specified by ResolutionUnit.

Name: YPosition
Desc: Offset from the top of the page to the top of the image. The unit of measure is specified by ResolutionUnit.

Name: FreeOffset
Desc: For each string of contiguous unused bytes, the byte offset of that string.

Name: FreeByteCounts
Desc: For each string of contiguous unused bytes, the number of bytes in that string.

Name: GrayResponseUnit
Desc: Precision of the number specified by GrayResponseCurve. 1 specifies tenths, 2 specifies hundredths, 3 specifies thousandths, and so on.

Name: GrayResponseCurve
Desc: For each possible pixel value in a grayscale image, the optical density of that pixel value.

Name: T4Option
Desc: Set of flags that relate to T4 encoding.

Name: T6Option
Desc: Set of flags that relate to T6 encoding.

Name: ResolutionUnit
Desc: Unit of measure for the horizontal resolution and the vertical resolution.

Name: PageNumber
Desc: Page number of the page from which the image was scanned.

Name: TransferFunction
Desc: Tables that specify transfer functions for the image.

Name: SoftwareUsed
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the name and version of the software or firmware of the device used to generate the image.

Name: DateTime
Desc: Date and time the image was created.

Name: Artist
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the name of the person who created the image.

Name: HostComputer
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the computer and/or operating system used to create the image.

Name: Predictor
Desc: Type of prediction scheme that was applied to the image data before the encoding scheme was applied.

Name: WhitePoint
Desc: Chromaticity of the white point of the image.

Name: PrimaryChromaticities
Desc: For each of the three primary colors in the image, the chromaticity of that color.

Name: ColorMap
Desc: Color palette (lookup table) for a palette-indexed image.

Name: HalftoneHints
Desc: Information used by the halftone function

Name: TileWidth
Desc: Number of pixel columns in each tile.

Name: TileLength
Desc: Number of pixel rows in each tile.

Name: TileOffset
Desc: For each tile, the byte offset of that tile.

Name: TileByteCounts
Desc: For each tile, the number of bytes in that tile.

Name: InkSet
Desc: Set of inks used in a separated image.

Name: InkNames
Desc: Sequence of concatenated, null-terminated, character strings that specify the names of the inks used in a separated image. 2 or 2× SamplesPerPixel

Name: NumberOfInks
Desc: Number of inks.

Name: DotRange
Desc: Color component values that correspond to a 0 percent dot and a 100 percent dot.

Name: TargetPrinter
Desc: Null-terminated character string that describes the intended printing environment.

Name: ExtraSamples
Desc: Number of extra color components. For example, one extra component might hold an alpha value.

Name: SampleFormat
Desc: For each color component, the numerical format (unsigned, signed, floating point) of that component. See also SamplesPerPixel.

Name: SMinSampleValue
Desc: For each color component, the minimum value of that component. See also SamplesPerPixel.

Name: SMaxSampleValue
Desc: For each color component, the maximum value of that component. See also SamplesPerPixel.

Name: TransferRange
Desc: Table of values that extends the range of the transfer function.

Name: JPEGProc
Desc: JPEG compression process.

Name: JPEGInterFormat
Desc: Offset to the start of a JPEG bitstream.

Name: JPEGInterLength
Desc: Length, in bytes, of the JPEG bitstream.

Name: JPEGRestartInterval
Desc: Length of the restart interval.

Name: JPEGLosslessPredictors
Desc: For each color component, a lossless predictor-selection value for that component. See also SamplesPerPixel.

Name: JPEGPointTransforms
Desc: For each color component, a point transformation value for that component. See also SamplesPerPixel.

Name: JPEGQTables
Desc: For each color component, the offset to the quantization table for that component. See also SamplesPerPixel.

Name: JPEGDCTables
Desc: For each color component, the offset to the DC Huffman table (or lossless Huffman table) for that component. See also SamplesPerPixel.

Name: JPEGACTables
Desc: For each color component, the offset to the AC Huffman table for that component. See also SamplesPerPixel.

Name: YCbCrCoefficients
Desc: Coefficients for transformation from RGB to YCbCr image data.

Name: YCbCrSubsampling
Desc: Sampling ratio of chrominance components in relation to the luminance component.

Name: YCbCrPositioning
Desc: Position of chrominance components in relation to the luminance component.

Name: REFBlackWhite
Desc: Reference black point value and reference white point value.

Name: Gamma
Desc: Gamma value attached to the image. The gamma value is stored as a rational number (pair of long) with a numerator of 100000. For example, a gamma value of 2.2 is stored as the pair (100000, 45455).

Name: ICCProfileDescriptor
Desc: Null-terminated character string that identifies an ICC profile.

Name: SRGBRenderingIntent
Desc: How the image should be displayed as defined by the International Color Consortium (ICC). If a GDI+ Image object is constructed with the useEmbeddedColorManagement parameter set to TRUE, then GDI+ renders the image according to the specified rendering intent. The intent can be set to perceptual, relative colorimetric, saturation, or absolute colorimetric.

Name: ImageTitle
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the title of the image.

Name: ResolutionXUnit
Desc: Units in which to display horizontal resolution.

Name: ResolutionYUnit
Desc: Units in which to display vertical resolution.

Name: ResolutionXLengthUnit
Desc: Units in which to display the image width.

Name: ResolutionYLengthUnit
Desc: Units in which to display the image height.

Name: PrintFlags
Desc: Sequence of one-byte Boolean values that specify printing options.

Name: PrintFlagsVersion
Desc: Print flags version.

Name: PrintFlagsCrop
Desc: Print flags center crop marks.

Name: PrintFlagsBleedWidth
Desc: Print flags bleed width.

Name: PrintFlagsBleedWidthScale
Desc: Print flags bleed width scale.

Name: HalftoneLPI
Desc: Ink's screen frequency, in lines per inch.

Name: HalftoneLPIUnit
Desc: Units for the screen frequency.

Name: HalftoneDegree
Desc: Angle for screen.

Name: HalftoneShape
Desc: Shape of the halftone dots.

Name: HalftoneMisc
Desc: Miscellaneous halftone information.

Name: HalftoneScreen
Desc: Boolean value that specifies whether to use the printer's default screens.

Name: JPEGQuality
Desc: Private tag used by the Adobe Photoshop format. Not for public use.

Name: GridSize
Desc: Block of information about grids and guides.

Name: ThumbnailFormat
Desc: Format of the thumbnail image.

Name: ThumbnailWidth
Desc: Width, in pixels, of the thumbnail image. 0 in the thumbnail image

Name: ThumbnailHeight
Desc: Height, in pixels, of the thumbnail image.

Name: ThumbnailColorDepth
Desc: bits per pixel (BPP) for the thumbnail image.

Name: ThumbnailPlanes
Desc: Number of color planes for the thumbnail image.

Name: ThumbnailRawBytes
Desc: Byte offset between rows of pixel data.

Name: ThumbnailSize
Desc: Total size, in bytes, of the thumbnail image.

Name: ThumbnailCompressedSize
Desc: Compressed size, in bytes, of the thumbnail image.

Name: ColorTransferFunction
Desc: Table of values that specify color transfer functions.

Name: ThumbnailData
Desc: Raw thumbnail bits in JPEG or RGB format. Depends on ThumbnailFormat.

Name: ThumbnailImageWidth
Desc: Number of pixels per row in the thumbnail image.

Name: ThumbnailImageHeight
Desc: Number of pixel rows in the thumbnail image. 0 in the thumbnail image

Name: ThumbnailBitsPerSample
Desc: Number of bits per color component in the thumbnail image. See also ThumbnailSamplesPerPixel.

Name: ThumbnailCompression
Desc: Compression scheme used for thumbnail image data.

Name: ThumbnailPhotometricInterp
Desc: How thumbnail pixel data will be interpreted.

Name: ThumbnailImageDescription
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the title of the image.

Name: ThumbnailEquipMake
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the manufacturer of the equipment used to record the thumbnail image. Total number of 16-bit words required for the tables

Name: ThumbnailEquipModel
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the model name or model number of the equipment used to record the thumbnail image.

Name: ThumbnailStripOffsets
Desc: For each strip in the thumbnail image, the byte offset of that strip. See also ThumbnailRowsPerStrip and ThumbnailStripBytesCount.

Name: ThumbnailOrientation
Desc: Thumbnail image orientation in terms of rows and columns. See also Orientation.

Name: ThumbnailSamplesPerPixel
Desc: Number of color components per pixel in the thumbnail image.

Name: ThumbnailRowsPerStrip
Desc: Number of rows per strip in the thumbnail image. See also ThumbnailStripBytesCount and ThumbnailStripOffsets.

Name: ThumbnailStripBytesCount
Desc: For each thumbnail image strip, the total number of bytes in that strip.

Name: ThumbnailResolutionX
Desc: Thumbnail resolution in the width direction. The resolution unit is given in ThumbnailResolutionUnit.

Name: ThumbnailResolutionY
Desc: Thumbnail resolution in the height direction. The resolution unit is given in ThumbnailResolutionUnit.

Name: ThumbnailPlanarConfig
Desc: Whether pixel components in the thumbnail image are recorded in chunky or planar format. See also PlanarConfig.

Name: ThumbnailResolutionUnit
Desc: Unit of measure for the horizontal resolution and the vertical resolution of the thumbnail image. See also ResolutionUnit.

Name: ThumbnailTransferFunction
Desc: Tables that specify transfer functions for the thumbnail image. See also TransferFunction.

Name: ThumbnailSoftwareUsed
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the name and version of the software or firmware of the device used to generate the thumbnail image.

Name: ThumbnailDateTime
Desc: Date and time the thumbnail image was created. See also DateTime.

Name: ThumbnailArtist
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the name of the person who created the thumbnail image.

Name: ThumbnailWhitePoint
Desc: Chromaticity of the white point of the thumbnail image. See also WhitePoint. 3x number of palette entries

Name: ThumbnailPrimaryChromaticities
Desc: For each of the three primary colors in the thumbnail image, the chromaticity of that color. See also PrimaryChromaticities.

Name: ThumbnailYCbCrCoefficients
Desc: Coefficients for transformation from RGB to YCbCr data for the thumbnail image. See also YCbCrCoefficients.

Name: ThumbnailYCbCrSubsampling
Desc: Sampling ratio of chrominance components in relation to the luminance component for the thumbnail image. See also YCbCrSubsampling.

Name: ThumbnailYCbCrPositioning
Desc: Position of chrominance components in relation to the luminance component for the thumbnail image. See also YCbCrPositioning.

Name: ThumbnailRefBlackWhite
Desc: Reference black point value and reference white point value for the thumbnail image. See also REFBlackWhite. Length of the histogram

Name: ThumbnailCopyRight
Desc: Null-terminated character string that contains copyright information for the thumbnail image.

Name: LuminanceTable
Desc: Luminance table. The luminance table and the chrominance table are used to control JPEG quality. A valid luminance or chrominance table has 64 entries of type Short. If an image has either a luminance table or a chrominance table, then it must have both tables.

Name: ChrominanceTable
Desc: Chrominance table. The luminance table and the chrominance table are used to control JPEG quality. A valid luminance or chrominance table has 64 entries of type Short. If an image has either a luminance table or a chrominance table, then it must have both tables.

Name: FrameDelay
Desc: Time delay, in hundredths of a second, between two frames in an animated GIF image.

Name: LoopCount
Desc: For an animated GIF image, the number of times to display the animation. A value of 0 specifies that the animation should be displayed infinitely.

Name: GlobalPalette
Desc: Color palette for an indexed bitmap in a GIF image.

Name: IndexBackground
Desc: Index of the background color in the palette of a GIF image.

Name: IndexTransparent
Desc: Index of the transparent color in the palette of a GIF image.

Name: PixelUnit
Desc: Unit for PixelPerUnitX and PixelPerUnitY.

Name: PixelPerUnitX
Desc: Pixels per unit in the x direction.

Name: PixelPerUnitY
Desc: Pixels per unit in the y direction.

Name: PaletteHistogram
Desc: Palette histogram.

Name: Copyright
Desc: Null-terminated character string that contains copyright information.

Name: ExifExposureTime
Desc: Exposure time, measured in seconds.

Name: ExifFNumber
Desc: F number.

Name: ExifIFD
Desc: Private tag used by GDI+. Not for public use. GDI+ uses this tag to locate Exif-specific information.

Name: ICCProfile
Desc: ICC profile embedded in the image.

Name: ExifExposureProg
Desc: Class of the program used by the camera to set exposure when the picture is taken.

Name: ExifSpectralSense
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies the spectral sensitivity of each channel of the camera used. The string is compatible with the standard developed by the ASTM Technical Committee.

Name: GpsIFD
Desc: Offset to a block of GPS property items. Property items whose tags have the prefix Gps are stored in the GPS block. The GPS property items are defined in the EXIF specification. GDI+ uses this tag to locate GPS information, but GDI+ does not expose this tag for public use.

Name: ExifISOSpeed
Desc: ISO speed and ISO latitude of the camera or input device as specified in ISO 12232.

Name: ExifOECF
Desc: Optoelectronic conversion function (OECF) specified in ISO 14524. The OECF is the relationship between the camera optical input and the image values.

Name: ExifVer
Desc: Version of the EXIF standard supported. Nonexistence of this field is taken to mean nonconformance to the standard. Conformance to the standard is indicated by recording 0210 as a 4-byte ASCII string. Because the type is Undefined, there is no NULL terminator.

Name: ExifDTOrig
Desc: Date and time when the original image data was generated. For a DSC, the date and time when the picture was taken. The format is YYYY:MM:DD HH:MM:SS with time shown in 24-hour format and the date and time separated by one blank character (0x2000). The character string length is 20 bytes including the NULL terminator. When the field is empty, it is treated as unknown.

Name: ExifDTDigitized
Desc: Date and time when the image was stored as digital data. If, for example, an image was captured by DSC and at the same time the file was recorded, then DateTimeOriginal and DateTimeDigitized will have the same contents.

Name: ExifCompConfig
Desc: Information specific to compressed data. The channels of each component are arranged in order from the first component to the fourth. For uncompressed data, the data arrangement is given in the PhotometricInterp tag.

Name: ExifCompBPP
Desc: Information specific to compressed data. The compression mode used for a compressed image is indicated in unit BPP.

Name: ExifShutterSpeed
Desc: Shutter speed. The unit is the Additive System of Photographic Exposure (APEX) value.

Name: ExifAperture
Desc: Lens aperture. The unit is the APEX value.

Name: ExifBrightness
Desc: Brightness value. The unit is the APEX value. Ordinarily it is given in the range of -99.99 to 99.99.

Name: ExifExposureBias
Desc: Exposure bias. The unit is the APEX value. Ordinarily it is given in the range -99.99 to 99.99.

Name: ExifMaxAperture
Desc: Smallest F number of the lens. The unit is the APEX value. Ordinarily it is given in the range of 00.00 to 99.99, but it is not limited to this range.

Name: ExifSubjectDist
Desc: Distance to the subject, measured in meters.

Name: ExifMeteringMode
Desc: Metering mode.

Name: ExifLightSource
Desc: Type of light source.

Name: ExifFlash
Desc: Flash status. This tag is recorded when an image is taken using a strobe light (flash). Bit 0 indicates the flash firing status, and bits 1 and 2 indicate the flash return status.

Name: ExifFocalLength
Desc: Actual focal length, in millimeters, of the lens. Conversion is not made to the focal length of a 35 millimeter film camera.

Name: ExifMakerNote
Desc: Note tag. A tag used by manufacturers of EXIF writers to record information. The contents are up to the manufacturer.

Name: ExifUserComment
Desc: Comment tag. A tag used by EXIF users to write keywords or comments about the image besides those in ImageDescription and without the character-code limitations of the ImageDescription tag.

Name: ExifDTSubsec
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies a fraction of a second for the DateTime tag.

Name: ExifDTOrigSS
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies a fraction of a second for the ExifDTOrig tag.

Name: ExifDTDigSS
Desc: Null-terminated character string that specifies a fraction of a second for the ExifDTDigitized tag.

Name: ExifFPXVer
Desc: FlashPix format version supported by an FPXR file. If the FPXR function supports FlashPix format version 1.0, this is indicated similarly to ExifVer by recording 0100 as a 4-byte ASCII string. Because the type is Undefined, there is no NULL terminator.

Name: ExifColorSpace
Desc: Color space specifier. Normally sRGB (=1) is used to define the color space based on the PC monitor conditions and environment. If a color space other than sRGB is used, Uncalibrated (=0xFFFF) is set. Image data recorded as Uncalibrated can be treated as sRGB when it is converted to FlashPix.

Name: ExifPixXDim
Desc: Information specific to compressed data. When a compressed file is recorded, the valid width of the meaningful image must be recorded in this tag, whether or not there is padding data or a restart marker. This tag should not exist in an uncompressed file.

Name: ExifPixYDim
Desc: Information specific to compressed data. When a compressed file is recorded, the valid height of the meaningful image must be recorded in this tag whether or not there is padding data or a restart marker. This tag should not exist in an uncompressed file. Because data padding is unnecessary in the vertical direction, the number of lines recorded in this valid image height tag will be the same as that recorded in the SOF.

Name: ExifRelatedWav
Desc: The name of an audio file related to the image data. The only relational information recorded is the EXIF audio file name and extension (an ASCII string that consists of 8 characters plus a period (.), plus 3 characters). The path is not recorded. When you use this tag, audio files must be recorded in conformance with the EXIF audio format. Writers can also store audio data within APP2 as FlashPix extension stream data.

Name: ExifInterop
Desc: Offset to a block of property items that contain interoperability information.

Name: ExifFlashEnergy
Desc: Strobe energy, in Beam Candle Power Seconds (BCPS), at the time the image was captured.

Name: ExifSpatialFR
Desc: Camera or input device spatial frequency table and SFR values in the image width, image height, and diagonal direction, as specified in ISO 12233.

Name: ExifFocalXRes
Desc: Number of pixels in the image width (x) direction per unit on the camera focal plane. The unit is specified in ExifFocalResUnit.

Name: ExifFocalYRes
Desc: Number of pixels in the image height (y) direction per unit on the camera focal plane. The unit is specified in ExifFocalResUnit.

Name: ExifFocalResUnit
Desc: Unit of measure for ExifFocalXRes and ExifFocalYRes.

Name: ExifSubjectLoc
Desc: Location of the main subject in the scene. The value of this tag represents the pixel at the center of the main subject relative to the left edge. The first value indicates the column number, and the second value indicates the row number.

Name: ExifExposureIndex
Desc: Exposure index selected on the camera or input device at the time the image was captured.

Name: ExifSensingMethod
Desc: Image sensor type on the camera or input device.

Name: ExifFileSource
Desc: The image source. If a DSC recorded the image, the value of this tag is 3.

Name: ExifSceneType
Desc: The type of scene. If a DSC recorded the image, the value of this tag must be set to 1, indicating that the image was directly photographed.

Name: ExifCfaPattern
Desc: The color filter array (CFA) geometric pattern of the image sensor when a one-chip color area sensor is used. It does not apply to all sensing methods.
